XXLChess.Pieces

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • XXLChess.Pieces.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Amazon, Archbishop, Bishop, Camel, Chancellor, Guard, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
